seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience with 4-5 relevant years, associate title but responsibilities and experience level suggest senior data engineer role

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with core focus on data pipelines, ETL, and data processing responsibilities

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on ETL tools, Azure Databricks, and batch processing capabilities with some real-time processing mentioned

leadership_expectation.evidence: Collaborative role working with teams but no mention of direct reports, hiring, or people management responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, and Azure Blob explicitly listed as mandatory skills with clear Azure focus

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Azure services

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description explicitly mentions both 'batch and real-time processing' capabilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific data orchestration tools mentioned - only Azure DevOps which is CI/CD focused

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Blob storage mentioned as primary storage with Databricks for processing, indicating data lake architecture

remote_restriction.evidence: On-site role specifically located in Kochi, Kerala, India with no remote work options mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: Location in Kochi, India places this role in APAC timezone (IST)

relocation_required.evidence: On-site position in specific location with no mention of remote work, implying relocation to Kochi required

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and role is India-based, H1B not applicable for Indian location

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and role is India-based, US student visas not applicable

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization restrictions mentioned for India-based position

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type with no contractor language mentioned, standard W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression paths, promotion ladders, or growth opportunities discussed

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaborative environment working with diverse teams including experienced professionals

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career growth opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities discussed

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between mandatory skills and preferred experience, balanced requirements approach

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data engineering role with well-defined responsibilities and specific technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements (Azure, Python, Spark, etc.) are reasonable for 6-7 years experience level
